definition: to leave/to part from/to be away from/(in giving distances) from/without (sth)/independent of/one of the Eight Trigrams 八卦[ba1 gua4], symbolizing fire/☲

sentences.english: Considerable attention is given to the action of centrifugal force in grinding wheels.
sentences.chinese: 磨床砂轮的离心力作用受到相当的关注。

sentences.english: The rod is coiled by means of centrifugal (laying head).
sentences.chinese: 绕杆方式为离心甩头式。

sentences.english: After centrifugation, the purity of the crude product was 23%.
sentences.chinese: 离心分离后，血红素粗品的纯度为23%。

sentences.english: High lift pump , but water is not applicable to.
sentences.chinese: 离心泵扬程较高，但出水量不大，适用于。

sentences.english: For decanters fitted with a bowl speed inverter, start up must always be done at low speed.
sentences.chinese: 对配有转鼓变速器的离心机，必须以低速启动。

sentences.english: It was not known if the envoys were given access to Natanz's underground centrifuge production hall.
sentences.chinese: 尚不清楚代表们是否参观了纳坦兹的地下离心机设施。

sentences.english: The advantages of the continuous process versus the centrifuge opener are laid out.
sentences.chinese: 与离心脱水开幅机相比，叙述了这一连续工艺的优点。

sentences.english: This centrifuge power unit must be rechecked.
sentences.chinese: 这台离心机的动力装置必需重新查抄。

sentences.english: The article deals with certain measures taken for surge and anti - surge control of centrifugal compressor.
sentences.chinese: 本文论述了离心式压缩机的喘振及防喘振控制问题。

sentences.english: The GC series boiler feed pump is multi-stage single-suction sectional horizontal centrifugal pumps.
sentences.chinese: 本系列泵是卧式单吸多级节段式离心泵。

sentences.english: The design of impeller meridional shape influences directly efficiency of centrifugal pumps.
sentences.chinese: 叶轮轴面图设计的好坏直接影响离心泵的效率。

sentences.english: Five zones were separated by improved discontinuous sucrose gradient centrifugation.
sentences.chinese: 用改进的不连续蔗糖密度梯度离心法分离到五条带。

sentences.english: At last, cylinder of double spiral roller grinded-paste machine is produced by centrifugal casting.
sentences.chinese: 最后，通过离心铸造生产出双螺旋辊式磨浆机筒体。

sentences.english: Flottweg is one of the world's leading producers of solid bowl centrifuges.
sentences.chinese: 福乐伟是世界领先的卧螺离心机制造商之一。

sentences.english: The generation of swirling flow in a centrifugal tundish is studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究离心中间包离心室旋流发生的方法。

sentences.english: The spin-drier use centrifugal force to made the cloth dry.
sentences.chinese: 甩干机用离心力让衣服变干。

definition: (of family members) separated from one another/scattered about/dispersed/(math.) discrete
dissociation/to break up a chemical compound into its elements
filtrate/solid residue produced by a filter/mud from filtering can sugar
against the stream/adverse current/a countercurrent/fig. reactionary tendency/to go against the trend
